```{r setup, include=FALSE}

```

```{r simulation}
set.seed(1); n <- 1000; m <- 5; pvalues <- rep(NA, n)

for (i in 1:n) {

data1 <- rnorm( m ); data2 <- rnorm( m )


pvalues[i] <- t.test(data1, data2, var.equal=TRUE)$p.value

}


sum(pvalues < 0.05) / length(pvalues)
```
